name: cleanfeed-recording-guard
description: CleanFeedで録音ボタンの押し忘れを防止するChrome拡張機能

scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/popup/*.html src/popup/*.css my-chrome-extension/ && cp my-chrome-extension/manifest.json dist/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:watch
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../cleanfeed-recording-guard.zip .
